fields.name: source
fields.description: Gets the source for this event (usually a RiText)

fields.name: type
fields.description: Returns the type for this event, e.g., RiTa.MOVE_TO

fields.name: data
fields.description: Returns the data for this event, if it has any

returns.desc: the data, which varies from event to event

fields.name: isType
fields.description: Returns true if the types match, else false e.g., RiTa.MOVE_TO

returns.desc: true if the types match, else false
